advancedsearch-desc: Alaha n-nyɛ li di yi niŋ ka a bɔri ni a niŋ vihigu din ti tooni n-ti li yaw [[Special:Search]]
advancedsearch-options-pane-preview-list: Saha ŋɔ zalikpana ŋɔ ka by zaŋ niŋ vihigu maa
advancedsearch-field-subpageof: Peeji ŋmahi shɛŋa din be peeji ŋɔ ni
advancedsearch-help-plain:
;Nahingbaŋ
:Vihimi bɔ bauhinia ŋɔ yuli bee di sabbu
;Zaŋmi a zaɣa niŋ binyɛra ŋɔ ni
:*
advancedsearch-help-or: ;Kahigibu : Hali di yi pɔri ka wula di tuya ni vihihu zalisi zaɣ' yini pahi paaji maa ni. ;Paaji sɔŋsim :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#words .2C_Phrases.2C_and _modifies words, phrases,and modifies] ;Syntax-tooi taɣira di yi niŋ ka a bɔri ni a niŋ vihigu zaɣ' mqŋli :Bachinima yi mali OR di sunsuuni kamani Laptop OR Notebook.
advancedsearch-help-not:
;Kahigibu
:Pahimi Peejinima din mali bachinima ŋɔ vihigu ni.
;Mi dimbɔŋɔ nima yɛla
:*
advancedsearch-sort-last-edit-asc: Dabsili maliniŋ- din yuui be zuɣusaa
advancedsearch-sort-last-edit-desc: Dabsili maliniŋ - din na niŋdi be zuɣusaa
advancedsearch-sort-create-timestamp-asc: Dabsili nambu - din yuui be zuɣusaa
advancedsearch-sort-create-timestamp-des: Dabsili nambu - din na niŋdi be zuɣusaa
advancedsearch-namespaces-remember: Teemi vihigu din na yɛn niŋ piibu yɛla
advancedsearch-namespaces-pane-preview-l: Yuya kpɛhibu shee n-na bɔŋɔ saha ŋɔ
advancedsearch-preference-help: Vihigu yi ti tooni di che ka di bɛhigu yi di ko: Vihigu peeji. Dimbɔŋɔ ti a soli ka a ni tooi niŋ vihigu ka di gahim, hali a yi bi mi vihigu syntax. Di lahi taɣiri yuya dɔnibu shee pii shɛm.
advancedsearch-preference-disable: Di wuhi di vihiri shɛli di ti toonti di yi niŋ a yɛn zaŋ soli din gahim:Vihibu
